channel.title: Flash [fixed - feel free to lock ty]
channel.description:
I wanted to learn to make stuff in flash, seeing JME post his little funny flash application thing I decided to ask a question for a problem thats just been a wall to me with flash.
I has adobe flash Cs3 Proffessional.
Here is what happens when I attempt to give an action to a button
[size=15pt] So I gets a button from the library [IMG]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/halp1.jpg[/img] I then clicks the button to highlight it and make it the current object [IMG]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/halp2.jpg[/img] I then right clicks it... [IMG]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/halp3.jpg[/img]
And then I click "Actions" or I could also press F9 to take me to: [IMG]http://i125.photobucket.com/albums/p80/davidude36/halp4.jpg[/img] Which is where I'm stuck; it doesn't let me put any actions for a button or any object like that for the matter. I can give actions to other shizzle bizzle so what is the problem? [/size]
Thanks for the replies

item.title: Flash [fixed - feel free to lock ty]
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:13, topic:198463”][quote author=pk4pk link=topic=263133.msg2178134#msg2178134 date=1207891731]

how does flash fail

It fails at games

Well its an easy thing for people who don’t want to learn a whole programming language just to make a game.

I found the answer here:
http://www.flashadvisor.com/forum/current-selection-cannot-t2407.html
Apparently adding a button in action script 2 is a whole lot easier then in action script 3

Well is everyone going to start playing a flash game and then the creator get rich? It’s just basics.
[/quote]
Well if I had the intentions to make money through creating a game, I and everyone else knows that if I made it in flash it would as you say “Fail”. But most people just make the games in their spare time for amusement and well being. The only thing people get from making flash games is [if its good] people being amused.

Also remember it isn’t just for making games, its also useful for being used in website templates.[/quote]
I’d guess. But immagine runescape in flash. I will start making an attempt

Read full topic
item.source: Flash [fixed - feel free to lock ty]

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“pk4pk, post:12, topic:198463”][quote author=davidude36 link=topic=263133.msg2178131#msg2178131 date=1207891545]

how does flash fail

It fails at games

Well its an easy thing for people who don’t want to learn a whole programming language just to make a game.

I found the answer here:
http://www.flashadvisor.com/forum/current-selection-cannot-t2407.html
Apparently adding a button in action script 2 is a whole lot easier then in action script 3
[/quote]
Well is everyone going to start playing a flash game and then the creator get rich? It’s just basics.[/quote]
Well if I had the intentions to make money through creating a game, I and everyone else knows that if I made it in flash it would as you say “Fail”. But most people just make the games in their spare time for amusement and well being. The only thing people get from making flash games is [if its good] people being amused.

Also remember it isn’t just for making games, its also useful for being used in website templates.

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Jme I found the answer to my problem I think. Just by searching google.
Seems adobe made it different to add actions to buttons in cs3. Stupid adobe >.<

Thanks anyway people and feel free to lock this one mod!

Its different to how you think.[/quote]

item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

I wanted to learn to make stuff in flash, seeing JME post his little funny flash application thing I decided to ask a question for a problem thats just been a wall to me with flash.

I has adobe flash Cs3 Proffessional.

Here is what happens when I attempt to give an action to a button

[size=15pt]
So I gets a button from the library

I then clicks the button to highlight it and make it the current object

I then right clicks it…

halp3.jpg595×513

And then I click “Actions” or I could also press F9 to take me to:

halp4.jpg800×600

Which is where I’m stuck; it doesn’t let me put any actions for a button or any object like that for the matter. I can give actions to other shizzle bizzle so what is the problem? [/size]
